messages.content:
Ok I just thought of something that might and might not be a valid question, but Im gonna ask anyway 😅 
For the players that get into the pre-Alpha - do they get to only play the game as casual players? Or would they be allowed access to, let´s say more materials, so that they can advance through the content faster? It was said that there is quite a big chunk of the game for the testers to play in, but will there be enough time to really explore that chunk? Some players might not have as much time on their hands and wouldn´t be able to "farm" all the resources needed. Please don´t take this as If Im spoiled and want benefits or anything 😅 At this point we don´t even know who gets to play the pre-Alpha. I thought of this simply because Im one of the players that would rather build and explore, rather than farm resources and Im not sure If there will be enough time for people like me to enjoy building and other resource-expensive things.
We want to understand how players progress through the current content, so accelerating that process would be a bad move for our learning.
